title: Ten no Shinwa Chi no Eien
original_name: 天の神話 地の永遠
sinopse:
This is the story of Hitsugi, a 100th generation miko from a line of the highest class of miko in Japan, who was given healing powers by the gods!

A story about the 99th generation miko is also included. Six works in total.

(Source: Aerandria Scans)
